TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "barrier", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 58, "index": 12}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 19}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a polished_granite_slab, I need to first craft 6 polished_granite. To do so, I need to first craft 4 granite. To do so, I need to first craft 4 quartz. To do so, I need to smelt the nether_quartz_ore at slot 24 into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 24 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "barrier", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 58, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 19}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 24}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have crafted the quartz, I need to place it in the crafting grid. Since I need to craft 4 quartz, I will place them in a 2x2 grid in the crafting grid. I will start by placing the quartz in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
